abstract.t: The Stream Control Transmission Protocol (SCTP) is a transport protocol originally defined to run on top of the network protocols IPv4 or IPv6. This document specifies how SCTP can be used on top of the Datagram Transport Layer Security (DTLS) protocol. Using the encapsulation method described in this document, SCTP is agnostic about the protocols being used below DTLS, explicit IP addresses can not be used in the SCTP control chunks. As a consequence, the SCTP associations are single homed.
